question.questionText: Explain why you got a voltage reading of 1.5 for terminal 1 and the positive terminal.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Terminal 1 and the positive terminal are separated by the gap
Terminal 1 and the positive terminal are not connected
terminal 1 is connected to the negative battery terminal
terminal 1 is not separated from the negative battery terminal

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: because terminal one and the positive terminal are connected
because terminal one is connected to the positive battery terminal
because terminal one and the positive battery terminal are on a closed path
because there is a gap between terminal one and the positive battery terminal
termianl 1 is not connected to the positive battery terminal.
The terminal is connected to a positive circuit.
It was separted by a gap.
